title: Quinn R Bugged (Forever a bird...)

replies.body:
same problem here,
ulti cd frozen at 118 secs 
says skill not found and wrong target while moving my mouse over the buttom
i had an early game dc and there was a Tham Kench in my team
can t remeber if i was interacting with him 
bug startet when i was back in base
had same problem, also reported it. Hope it will be fixed soon. In my situation i got w'd by tahm kench when i was in ult and i could't move back
